    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-001-003-001",
    "action": "Storm clouds gather as Elias performs routine maintenance on the beacon, the wind beginning to howl around the lighthouse",
    "intention": "Establish the external storm as mirror to internal turmoil",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The beacon requires constant maintenance", "Storms are a regular threat to the lighthouse"],
    "information_withheld": ["The depth of Elias's growing despair", "How long he has been alone"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-001-003-002",
    "action": "As rain lashes the windows, Elias climbs the spiral stairs to check the beacon's flame, his movements mechanical and weary",
    "intention": "Show the repetitive nature of his duty and his emotional exhaustion",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 0,
    "information_revealed": ["Elias's duties are repetitive and isolating", "He maintains the beacon alone"],
    "information_withheld": ["His thoughts about escape", "The true cost of his isolation"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-001-003-003",
    "action": "The beacon flickers dangerously in the wind, and Elias struggles to adjust the mechanisms while lightning illuminates his haggard face",
    "intention": "Create physical manifestation of his internal struggle",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The beacon is vulnerable to storms", "Elias's physical deterioration from isolation"],
    "information_withheld": ["His growing doubts about his purpose", "Whether he can continue this life"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-001-003-004",
    "action": "Elias pauses at the beacon room window, watching ships' lights in the distance, and realizes he has forgotten what it feels like to speak to another person",
    "intention": "Reveal the profound depth of his isolation",
    "pivot": true,
    "tension_delta": 0,
    "information_revealed": ["Elias has been alone so long he's losing human connection", "Ships still pass but he cannot reach them"],
    "information_withheld": ["How he came to be the lighthouse keeper", "Whether rescue is possible"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-001-003-005",
    "action": "The storm intensifies and Elias must choose between his own safety and maintaining the beacon as waves crash against the lighthouse base",
    "intention": "Force confrontation between duty and self-preservation",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The lighthouse faces genuine danger", "Elias's commitment to his duty despite personal cost"],
    "information_withheld": ["His internal debate about abandoning his post", "The consequences of beacon failure"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-001-003-006",
    "action": "Elias secures the beacon and descends to find his living quarters flooded, his few personal possessions floating in the dark water",
    "intention": "Symbolize the washing away of his former self and connections",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 0,
    "information_revealed": ["The storm has invaded his personal space", "His possessions are few and now damaged"],
    "information_withheld": ["What the possessions meant to him", "His emotional response to the loss"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-001-003-007",
    "action": "Sitting in the flooded room, Elias finally allows himself to weep, understanding that he may never leave this island and that his sacrifice may be meaningless",
    "intention": "Culminate the emotional arc with full acceptance of his isolation",
    "pivot": true,
    "tension_delta": -1,
    "information_revealed": ["Elias's complete emotional breakdown", "His realization that escape may be impossible", "His doubt about the meaning of his sacrifice"],
    "information_withheld": ["Whether his duty truly matters", "If anyone remembers or cares about his service"]
  }
]
